pages.text: $(li)Hungers are creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/desert)Deserts$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamp$(/l).$(br)$(li)They will bury itself in the ground or sand in order not to be detected.$(br)$(li)When they detect the presence of something above them, they will nimbly close their jaws in order to catch their prey.
On death the may drop $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/experience_bottle)Bottle o' Enchanting$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/outvoted/void_heart)Void Hearts$(/l).

$(li)If this creature makes you any damage, it will randomly remove 1 level of your enchant armor.$(br)$(li)This creature really love to eat everything like you drop on their heads.$(br)$(li)They works as a kind of trash can.
$(li)You can join enchanted items with not enchanted items. Just throw them to this creature to combine it and obtain a new enchanted item.

$(li)For example, you can throw a Sword with an Looting 1 enchantment applied and other Sword without any kind of enchantment applied.$(br)$(li)Then, this creature will expel from its mouth the new enchanted item.$(br)$(li)This can be used to apply enchants to items using enchanted books and the specific item to enchant.
